description: A collection of Grafana panels to monitor a federated LF application

targets.query:
import "join"
import "system"
import "array"
import "internal/debug"

heartbeats = from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["_measurement"] == "FederateNames" and r["_field"] == "other_process_name"))
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "other_process_name"})
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["other_process_name", "_time", "process_name"])

latest_tracepoints = from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => (r["_measurement"] == "TraceRecord" and r["_field"] == "process_id"))
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "process_id"})
  |> keep(columns: ["process_id", "_time", "process_name"])
  |> group(columns: ["process_id"]) |> max(column: "_time") |> group()

isEmpty = (tables) => {
	columnsArray = tables
		|> columns()
		|> findColumn(fn: (key) => true, column: "_value")
	return length(arr: columnsArray) == 0
}

d = join.left(
  left: heartbeats |> keep(columns: ["other_process_name"]) |> unique(column: "other_process_name"),
  right: if isEmpty(tables: latest_tracepoints)
    then array.from(rows: [{
      process_id: debug.null(type: "int"),
      _time: time(v: 0),
      process_name: debug.null(type: "string")}])
    else latest_tracepoints,
  on: (l, r) => l.other_process_name == r.process_name,
  as: (l, r) => ({l with
    other_time: r._time
  }))
  |> group(columns: ["other_process_name"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with other_time: if exists r.other_time then r.other_time else time(v: 0)}))
  |> max(column: "other_time")
  |> group()
e = join.left(
  left: d, right: heartbeats,
  on: (l, r) => l.other_process_name == r.process_name,
  as: (l, r) => (if not exists l.other_time or r._time > l.other_time
    then (if not exists r._time then {l with greater_time: time(v: 0), last_message: "NONE"} else {l with greater_time: r._time, last_message: "HEARTBEAT"})
    else {l with greater_time: l.other_time, last_message: "TRACEPOINT"})
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["greater_time", "other_process_name", "last_message"])
  |> group(columns: ["other_process_name"])
  |> max(column: "greater_time")
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with time_since_last_activity:
    if r.greater_time == time(v: 0)
     then debug.null(type: "time")
     else (int(v: system.time()) - int(v: r.greater_time))}))

ret = e
  |> drop(columns: ["greater_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with status: if not exists r.time_since_last_activity
    then "DISCONNECTED"
    else (if r.last_message == "TRACEPOINT" then "OK" else "QUIET")}))
  |> drop(columns: ["last_message"])
  |> rename(columns: {
    "other_process_name": "Process",
    "time_since_last_activity": "Age of latest data"
    })
ret

import "strings"

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "TraceRecord")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "process_id")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r.id_description and not strings.hasPrefix(prefix: "nr_", v: r.id_description) and not strings.hasPrefix(prefix: "ns_", v: r.id_description))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["event_kind_description"] == "Reaction starts")
  |> group()
  |> drop(columns: ["host", "worker", "dst_id", "src_id", "_field", "_time", "process_name", "_measurement"])
  |> group(columns: ["id_description"])
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> sort(desc: true)
  |> rename(columns: {id_description: "Reactor", _value: "Number of reaction executions"})

panels.description: The x-axis is the logical time, and the y-axis is the maximum lag (physical time minus logical time) observed in a given reactor at a logical time.

targets.query:
import "strings"

ungrouped = from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "TraceRecord")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "logical_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["network_reactor"] == "false")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.event_kind_description == "Reaction starts")
  |> keep(columns: ["event_kind_description", "id_description", "process_name", "_time", "_value", ""])
  |> group(columns: ["id_description", "_value"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with "lag in": int(v: r._time) - int(v: r._value)}))
  |> max(column: "lag in")

ret = ungrouped
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "lag in", "process_name", "id_description"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: time(v: r._value)}))
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "_time"})
  |> group(columns: ["id_description"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r.id_description)

ret

panels.title: Maximum lag per reactor over logical time

panels.description: This is the maximum lag (difference between physical and logical time) at the start of any reaction execution in the current time interval.

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "TraceRecord")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "lag")
  |> keep(columns: ["process_name", "_value"])
  |> group(columns: ["process_name"])
  |> max()
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "lag in "})

panels.title: Max lag (nanoseconds) in the current time interval

sort.field: lag {dst_id="0", event_kind_description="Reaction ends", host="telegraf", id_description="laggy", process_name="trace", worker="0"}

panels.description: This is the maximum observed reaction execution time in the current time interval, per process, so it does not rule out the possibility that reactions might take longer in the future. This information can be used to identify processes that have slow or misbehaving reactions.

targets.query:
import "strings"
import "math"

reactions = from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "TraceRecord")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.network_reactor == "false")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "logical_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.event_kind_description == "Reaction starts" or r.event_kind_description == "Reaction ends")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with reaction_id: "${r["process_name"]}_${r["dst_id"]}"}))
  |> drop(columns: ["process_name", "dst_id"])
  |> group(columns: ["reaction_id"])
  |> pivot(
    rowKey: ["_value"],
    columnKey: ["event_kind_description"],
    valueColumn: "_time"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: uint(v: r["Reaction ends"]) - uint(v: r["Reaction starts"]) }))
  |> drop(columns: ["Reaction starts", "Reaction ends"])
  |> max()
  |> group()
  
  reactions

panels.title: Reaction WCET

panels.description: Position on the timeline corresponds to physical time.

targets.query:
import "strings"
import "math"
import "internal/debug"

reactions = from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "TraceRecord")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.network_reactor == "false")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "logical_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.event_kind_description == "Reaction starts" or r.event_kind_description == "Reaction ends")
  |> group(columns: ["id_description"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "event_kind_description", "id_description", "extra_delay"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with "extra_delay": int(v: r.extra_delay)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with "event": if r.event_kind_description == "Reaction ends" then "IDLE" else (if int(v: r._time) > r._value + r.extra_delay and r.extra_delay > 0 then "DEADLINE_VIOLATED" else "EXECUTING")}))
  |> group()
  |> drop(columns: ["_value"])

ret = reactions
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with "id_description2": r.id_description}))
  |> pivot(
    rowKey: ["_time", "id_description2"],
    columnKey: ["id_description"],
    valueColumn: "event"
  )
  |> drop(columns: ["id_description2"])

ret

panels.title: Reaction executions (red indicates deadline violation)

panels.description: Areas with a higher opacity correspond to reaction executions that have later logical tags (where a tag is a logical time combined with a microstep). Position on the timeline corresponds to physical time.

targets.query:
import "strings"
import "math"
import "internal/debug"
import "join"

microsteps = from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "TraceRecord")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.network_reactor == "false")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "microstep")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.event_kind_description == "Reaction starts" or r.event_kind_description == "Reaction ends")
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> group()

before_difference = from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "TraceRecord")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.network_reactor == "false")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "logical_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.event_kind_description == "Reaction starts" or r.event_kind_description == "Reaction ends")
  |> group(columns: ["id_description"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "event_kind_description", "id_description"])
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with "event": r._value}))
  |> sort(columns: ["_value", "_time"])


// initial_value = set_priority |> first(column: "extra_delay") |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with "_time": v.timeRangeStart}))

// union(tables: [initial_value, set_priority])

initial_value = before_difference |> first(column: "_value")

joined = join.inner(
  left: union(tables: [initial_value, before_difference]),
  right: microsteps,
  on: (l, r) => l._time == r._time,
  as: (l, r) => ({l with microstep: r._value})
)

reactions = joined
  |> sort(columns: ["_value", "_time"])
  |> difference(columns: ["event", "microstep"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with "event": if r.event > 0 or r.microstep > 0 then 1 else 0}))
  |> cumulativeSum(columns: ["event"])
  |> sort(columns: ["id_description", "_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with "event": if r.event_kind_description == "Reaction ends" then -1 else r.event}))
  |> drop(columns: ["_value", "event_kind_description"])

final_values = reactions
  |> group(columns: ["id_description"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> last(column: "_time")
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with "_time": v.timeRangeStop}))

ret = union(tables: [reactions, final_values])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with "id_description2": r.id_description}))
  |> pivot(
    rowKey: ["_time", "id_description2"],
    columnKey: ["id_description"],
    valueColumn: "event"
  )
  |> drop(columns: ["id_description2"])

ret

panels.title: Reaction executions (opacity indicates logical time and microstep)

panels.description: Reactions without deadlines are excluded from this calculation.

targets.query:
import "strings"
import "math"
import "internal/debug"

reactions = from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "TraceRecord")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.network_reactor == "false")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "logical_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.event_kind_description == "Reaction starts")
  |> group(columns: ["id_description"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "id_description", "extra_delay"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with "extra_delay": int(v: r.extra_delay)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with "Deadline violations per scheduled reaction": if r.extra_delay < 0 then debug.null(type: "int") else if int(v: r._time) > r._value + r.extra_delay then 1 else 0}))
  |> drop(columns: ["extra_delay", "_value"])
  |> mean(column: "Deadline violations per scheduled reaction")
  |> group()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r["Deadline violations per scheduled reaction"])
reactions

panels.title: Deadline violations per scheduled reaction

title: LF Tracing
